get.description:
This endpoint returns the entire navigation structure of the dashboard. It has three levels:

1. The first level represents main menu sections.
2. Each section can be seperated into groups.
3. Groups contain the actual menu links.

badge.description: Information about a badge to display beside the link.

react.description: Whether or not the link represents a React component.

url.description: The URL to the menu if it doesn't have a submenu.

parameters.description:
When the discussion was created.
This filter receive a string that can take two forms.
A single date that matches '{Operator}{DateTime}' where {Operator} can be =, <, >, <=, >= and, if omitted, defaults to =.
A date range that matches '{Opening}{DateTime},{DateTime}{Closing}' where {Opening} can be '[' or '(' and {Closing} can be ']' or ')'. '[]' are inclusive and '()' are exclusive.
parameters.name: dateInserted

parameters.description:
When the discussion was updated.
This filter receive a string that can take two forms.
A single date that matches '{Operator}{DateTime}' where {Operator} can be =, <, >, <=, >= and, if omitted, defaults to =.
A date range that matches '{Opening}{DateTime},{DateTime}{Closing}' where {Opening} can be '[' or '(' and {Closing} can be ']' or ')'. '[]' are inclusive and '()' are exclusive.
parameters.name: dateUpdated

parameters.description: Only fetch discussions from followed categories. Pinned discussions are mixed in.
parameters.name: followed

parameters.description: Whether or not to include pinned discussions. If true, only return pinned discussions. Cannot be used with the pinOrder parameter.
parameters.name: pinned

parameters.description:
If including pinned posts, in what order should they be integrated? When "first", discussions pinned to a specific category will only be affected if the discussion's category is passed as the categoryID parameter. Cannot be used with the pinned parameter.
Must be one of: "first", "mixed".
parameters.name: pinOrder

recordType.description: The type of record associated with this draft.

attending.description: Is the participant attending the event.

userID.description: The user ID of the participant.

format.description: The input format of the event.

groupID.description: The group the event is in.

format.description: The input format of the event.

groupID.description: The group the event is in.

bannerUrl.description: The URL of the banner of the group.

format.description: The input format of the group.

iconUrl.description: The URL of the icon of the group.

privacy.description: The privacy level of the group's content.

reason.description: The reason why the applicant wants to join the group.

userID.description: The user ID of the applicant.

insertUserID.description: The user that created the invite.

userID.description: The ID of the user that has been invited.

dateInserted.description: When the user was added to the group.

insertUserID.description: The user that added this user to the group.

role.description: The role of the user for that group.

userID.description: The user ID of the member of the group.

bannerUrl.description: The URL of the banner of the group.

format.description: The input format of the group.

iconUrl.description: The URL of the icon of the group.

iconUrl.description: The URL of the icon of the group.

privacy.description: The privacy level of the group's content.

foreignID.description: Unique ID of the resource this media item will be attached to.

foreignType.description: Type of resource the media item will be attached to (e.g. comment).

insertUserID.description: The user that created the message.

format.description: The input format of the record.

body.description: The notification text. This contains some HTML, but only <b> tags.

dateInserted.description: When the notification was first made.

dateUpdated.description:
When the notification was last updated.

Notifications on the same record will group together into a single notification, updating just the dateUpdated property.

notificationID.description: A unique ID to identify the notification.

photoUrl.description: An avatar or thumbnail associated with the notification.

read.description: Whether or not the notification has been seen.

discussionID.description: The discussion the poll is displayed in.

pollID.description: The unique ID of the poll.

discussionID.description: The discussion the poll is displayed in.

pollOptionID.description: The unique ID of the option.

userID.description: The user that made the vote

commentID.description: The comment ID of the post, if any.

discussionID.description: The discussion ID of the post.

insertUserID.description: The author of the post.

avatar.description: Allow user to have a custom avatar.

editTimeout.description: Length of time, in seconds, a user can edit their post. -1 for no limit.

location.description: Allow user to have a location.

roleID.description: Permissions of this role are applied to users with the rank.

signature.description: Allow user to have a signature.

signatureImages.description: Maximum number of images in a signature. -1 for no limit.

title.description: Allow user to have a title.

verified.description: Verified status. true is verified. false requires verification.

posts.description: Total posts created by the user.

roleID.description: ID of a role required for this rank.

time.description: Age of user account (e.g. 1 day, 3 weeks, 1 month).

cssClass.description: Custom CSS class for users of this rank.

level.description: Level of the rank. Determines the sort order.

notificationBody.description: Message for the users when they earn this rank.

userTitle.description: Label that will display beside the user.

active.description: Is this type available for use?

class.description: The classification of the type. Directly maps to permissions.

hidden.description: Should this type be hidden from the UI?

points.description: Reputation points to be applied along with this reaction.

tagID.description: The numeric ID of the tag associated with the type.

canSession.description: Can users in this role start a session?

personalInfo.description: Is membership in this role personal information?

personalInfo.description: Is membership in this role personal information?

groupID.description: The id of the group or the id of the group containing the record.

insertUserID.description: The user that created the record.

name.description: The title of the record. A comment would be "RE: {DiscussionTitle}".

updateUserID.description: The user that updated the record.

status.description: Status code of the error response.

ThemeAssets.description: Assets to include in a page as part of the theme.

javascript.description: An absolute URL to the theme's JavaScript file.

styles.description: An absolute URL to the theme's stylesheet.

ThemeFontsAsset.description: A collection of external font resources.

ThemeLogoAsset.description: Site logo to be displayed in the theme.

ThemeMobileLogoAsset.description: Site logo to be displayed in the theme when viewed on a mobile device.

ThemeScriptsAsset.description: External script files to be included.

ThemeVariablesAsset.description: A collection of variables intended to be used by theme.

accessToken.description: A signed version of the token.

dateLastActive.description: Time the user was last active.

dateUpdated.description: When the user was last updated.

points.description: The total number of points the user has accumulated.

emailConfirmed.description: Has the email address for the user been confirmed?

hidden.description: Is this user hiding their online status?

bypassSpam.description: Should submissions from this user bypass SPAM checks?

userTitle.description: Label that will display beside the user.

showEmail.description: Is the email address visible to other users?

insertUserID.description: The user that created the user badge relation.
